content:
The Flying Pig Downtown Hostel is a popular choice among students and travelers.

That's great to hear that you're taking a French language course at Sorbonne University! Improving your language skills will definitely enhance your experience in Paris and beyond. Sorbonne University is one of the most prestigious institutions in France, so you're in good hands.

How's your French coming along? Are you finding it challenging or enjoyable? Have you had any particularly interesting or funny moments while learning the language?

By the way, since you're taking a language course, you might want to consider practicing your Dutch language skills before your trip to Amsterdam. While many Amsterdamers speak English, it's always appreciated when visitors make an effort to speak the local language. You can use apps like Duolingo or Babbel to learn some basic Dutch phrases, or even take a free online course.

Now, back to Amsterdam... Have you thought about what you want to do and see during your trip? Amsterdam has a lot to offer, from the famous canals and museums to the vibrant nightlife and quirky neighborhoods. I can definitely provide some recommendations if you need help planning your itinerary!
